skills.name: rot
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to any character in Column A. Recover one of your Vampire cards belonging to this character from the trash. Gain 1 action.

characters.name: Hey You This is a test

skills.name: hello!
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to 1 character in Column A or B. Gain 1 action.

skills.name: poof
skills.description: Trash X cards from your hand, up to 4. Techies deals 1 damage to a character in column A. Trash this card.
